snippet.title: Xbox 360 Longplay [087] Earthworm Jim HD
snippet.description:
htp://www.longplays.org

Played By: kireev20000

The gameplay remains the same. Plus I dislike what they have done to the music. It's a setback compared to the Sega CD version.
Well, actually its because Tommy Tallarico have the rights of music and SE, and HE told them that he could give them the sound effects and music, but Interplay said No, Thanks. Stupid move, if you ask me. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
